/usr/bin/clang++   -std=c++14 -g -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.14.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/learn-opengl.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o learn-opengl  -framework OpenGL libglad.a lib/glfw/src/libglfw3.a -framework Cocoa -framework IOKit -framework CoreFoundation
